high_descs: Turn around and go to the desk against the wall in the back of the room
pick up the yellow disc that is on the desk
turn to your left and walk towards the bed turn to the desk
turn on the lamp that is on the desk
anns.task_desc: Turn on the desk lamp while holding a yellow disc

high_descs: Turn around, walk to the table
Grab the yellow stand on the table
walk to the left a little
turn on the lamp on the table
anns.task_desc: grab the yellow stand on the table, turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn around and go to the desk.
Turn on the lamp on the desk.
Turn left, take a step, turn left and walk across the room to face the desk.
Pick up the yellow disk shaped object on the table.
Turn to the left, take a step, turn right to face to lamp.
anns.task_desc: To pick up a yellow object, as well as turn on a lamp.
